original_text: And there went out another horse that was red: and power was given to him that sat thereon to take peace from the earth, and that they should kill one another: and there was given unto him a great sword.
korean_text: 이에 다른 붉은 말이 나오더라 그 탄 자가 허락을 받아 땅에서 화평을 제하여 버리며 서로 죽이게 하고 또 큰 칼을 받았더라

sentences.original_text: And there went out another horse
and power was given to him
to take peace from the earth
and that they should kill one another
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 서로 죽이게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: and there was given unto him
